Introduction to AI Safety, Ethics, and Society

This book provides an introduction to the technical challenges in making AI safer and a clear-eyed account of the coordination problems needed to ensure AI is developed and deployed safely. It offers a comprehensive and accessible guide to understanding the potential risks AI may pose and how to develop and deploy it safely.

Key Concepts:

  • AI risk
  • AI safety
  • Coordination problems
  • Catastrophic risks
AI Artificial Intelligence Safety Ethics Society
Technology Intermediate
